MCGOWAN / DEPP




(McGowan ducks the shots but 2. She spins around, swingi=
ng a left punch at at Firearm...)



(Depp is kicked in the stomach. He sti=
ll keeps a firm grip on Hot Rod's wrist. He thrust his left knee foward, at=
tempting to knee Hot Rod in the stomach...)

  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 1=
3, 2001 11:16 PM
  Subject: Re: Fire!


  ::Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Fire=
arm/Hot Rod::

  Not expecting the sudden movement, Rixer takes the kick sq=
uare in the
  jaw, and hits the ground.
  "Yikes, what force!"

  Cleder, B=
lyer, Firearm, and Forrior who had just rejoined the fight
  aimed at McGow=
an's head. Once again each fireing two shots.(8 again)
  They hope that the=
 head will be a weak spot.

  Hot Rod saw the sword coming, and grabed the =
wrist of that arm. Now Depp
  and Hot Rod had a hold on each others arms. H=
ot Rod sent a good thrust
  kick at Depp's stomach.(I dont think there woul=
d be much room to
  counter, if they are close enough to have hold of each =
other)
